tweets.text:
WOW wow WOW

tweets.text:
#WasteCrime is so much more than simply fly-tipping.

Waste criminals may dump waste on your land or property illegally, leaving you with the cost of clearing up.

Secure your premises and report suspicious waste activities anonymously to Crimestoppers online or call 0800 555 111 https://t.co/exrBNrP3jo
